#### Review Instructions
Please note that the Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the Task Based Professional Service (TSPS) Must be published simultaneously with the issuance of the letter of invitation to suppliers.

#### About the Requirement
The Department of National Defence is seeking the professional services of a Senior SAP Security Business Process Consultant. The objective is to build a resilient Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS) Access Control framework and a unified Roles and Authorizations (R&A) strategy.

#### Key Requirements

*   The Consultant must be able to integrate a Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC) Access Control solution to address access risks in the DRMIS landscape.
*   Work must be in accordance with the Department of Financial Controls (DFC), Department of National Defence and Canadian Armed Forces policies and procedures.
*   The Consultant must support all business transformation initiatives.

#### Estimated Level of Effort
The estimated level of effort is 240 days, with an optional six-month period of 100 days.
